item.title: PHP Recruiting Email
item.description: An email from a recruiter Dustin, Always Are you ready to take the next steps in your career? < YES But No one wants to do php Iâ€™ve got a client looking for a PHP Developer (Laravel, Javascript) in Nashville, TN. The full job description is below. < So steps backwards? Indeed If you are a PHP Developer with experience, please read on! What You Will Be Doing < I am and this makes me sad.
